DOC.brief_title: An Alternative Treatment Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia Using Focal Loop Electrosurgical Excision Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: Standard treatment precancerous cell cervix call electrosurgical excision procedure ( LEEP ) . Standard LEEP involve treat entire cervix use FDA-approved equipment . Focal LEEP utilizes surgery equipment treat visually unhealthy part cervix entire cervix . Side effect unusual symptom monitor well patient 's thought recommendation procedure . The total amount time study participation six month .
